author: Madeline Miller
review: A mesmerizing retelling of the story of Circe, the witch from Homer's Odyssey, offering a fresh perspective and rich narrative.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A spellbinding tale set in a mysterious and magical circus that arrives without warning, captivating readers with its enchanting atmosphere.

author: Kristin Hannah
review: A poignant and gripping story of two sisters in World War II France, showcasing the resilience and strength of the human spirit.

author: Delia Owens
review: A hauntingly beautiful novel that transports readers to the marshes of North Carolina, blending mystery, romance, and nature writing.

author: Donna Tartt
review: A sprawling and immersive novel following the life of a young boy who survives a terrorist attack at an art museum, intertwining themes of loss, friendship, and art.

author: Donna Tartt
review: A mesmerizing and atmospheric tale of murder and academia, exploring themes of morality, friendship, and the allure of privilege.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A labyrinthine tale set in a world of hidden libraries, magical books, and star-crossed lovers, inviting readers on a journey of discovery and wonder.

author: Madeline Miller
review: An evocative retelling of the story of Achilles and Patroclus, blending mythology with a tender exploration of love and destiny.

author: J.R.R. Tolkien
review: An enchanting tale of adventure and heroism in Middle-earth, perfect for readers of all ages.
